title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
itunes:title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1:

Ken Matthews guest hosts for Rush on Thursday. Can you believe we’re this close to July 4? Keep the volunteer firefighters in mind. The ridiculous claim that moderates and conservatives want to suppress the vote. Elections from 2012 to 2018 have had 28 million missing mail-in ballots. Media Bubbas up NooseCAR. Look at the COVID numbers, not the headlines. We are in coronavirus recovery. Every leftist knucklehead wants a piece of this Marxist action.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2:

The left glees over hate hoaxes. Media uses lede to fit their narrative. Statues are art. Why are they unacceptable but the left’s “art” is? The left does not want to debate, it wants to destroy. Large cities are failing, time to migrate to the small towns. What can be done to protect election integrity in suspect areas? Imagine the devastation of 28 million missing mail-in votes in 2020. Coronavirus death padding. Mandatory quarantine for out-of-state travel in Northeast.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:

The Late Night Jimmys go full woke. The Dixie Chicks change name to The Chicks. Pelosi: Republicans want to get away with George Floyd murder. You can never appease the leftist mob. Top 20 most violent cities in America, 18 run by Democrats. Live talk radio is the last bastion for the truth. Don’t ban chokeholds, police just need better training. There’s a reason for police escalation of force. Leftist domestic terrorism designed to stop you from voting Trump. Don’t let anyone keep you from voting for who you want elected.


Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
